mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DIGGING WHERE DIGGING_TOPIC = #{diggingTopic} AND ENROLL_DT >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY READ_CNT DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIGGING WHERE DIGGING_TOPIC = #{diggingTopic}
SELECT * FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT WRITER FROM DIGGING)
SELECT DIGGING_TOPIC, DIG FROM DIGGING WHERE DIGGING_TOPIC = #{diggingTopic} GROUP BY DIG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIGGING( WRITER, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DIGGING_TOPIC, FILE, VIDEO_YN, VIDEO_ID, DIG, ENROLL_DT ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{diggingTopic}, #{file}, #{videoYn}, #{videoId}, #{dig}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE DIG SET DIG_CNT = DIG_CNT + 1 WHERE DIG = #{dig}
mapper.select: SELECT D.DIGGING_ID AS DIGGING_ID, D.WRITER AS WRITER, D.SUBJECT AS SUBJECT, D.CONTENT AS CONTENT, D.READ_CNT AS READ_CNT, D.DIGGING_TOPIC AS DIGGING_TOPIC, D.ENROLL_DT AS ENROLL_DT, D.REPLY_CNT AS REPLY_CNT, D.THUMBS_UP AS THUMBS_UP, D.FILE AS FILE, D.VIDEO_YN AS VIDEO_YN, D.VIDEO_ID AS VIDEO_ID, U.PROFILE AS PROFILE FROM DIGGING D JOIN USER U ON D.WRITER = U.USER_ID WHERE D.DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
mapper.update: UPDATE DIGGING SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
UPDATE DIGGING SET THUMBS_UP = THUMBS_UP + 1 WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
